ai-iti60:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti60:2.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these three grounds for making merit.
ai-iti60:2.3_0: Giving, ethical conduct, and meditation are all grounds for making merit.
ai-iti60:2.4_0: These are the three grounds for good deeds.”
ai-iti60:4.2_0: happy with the three kinds of happiness:
ai-iti60:4.3_0: Such an astute person is reborn
ai-iti60:5.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
ai-iti60:5.2_0: First the first part of the body.
